children.value: import Callout from "../../src/components/Callout";
üöÄ Welcome to
hummingbot
version 0.29.0! This release introduces a new feature that allows users to run custom scripts, a new advanced pure market-making parameter, a new connector, and bug fixes.
ü§ñ New feature: Scripts

The new Scripts feature allows the user to create mini-Python functions that adjust how Hummingbot behaves. For example, users can automate changes to bot params when certain conditions are met. Read more about the scripts feature in the
Scripts
section in the documentation.

<Callout
  type="warning"
  body="Currently, Scripts can only be used when running Hummingbot from source or with Docker. Using this feature in the Mac or Windows installers will crash the bot."
/>
üîó New connector: Eterbase
Hummingbot now supports
Eterbase
exchange! Eterbase claims to be the first regulation-compliant European cryptocurrency exchange.
üìä New param: Take Crossed Orders
When using an external price source with pure market making, we added the
take_if_crossed
parameter that allows the strategy to fill the matching maker order when it results in a crossed market.
In certain cases, this behavior may be desirable even if the fee is higher because of the likely future price mitigation.
üêû Other Enhancements and Bug Fixes
Additional debugging message for websocket connection issues
and when orders get stuck in Bittrex
Limit orders as LIMIT orders instead of makers and market orders are MARKET instead of takers
Added cap on base asset range to fix a bug with inventory skew aggressively, creating more buy orders even within the target range
Reduced Infura consumption with websocket connection
Replaced inventory skew with ping pong feature during basic configuration walkthrough with pure market-making strategy
Fixed orders getting stuck in Hummingbot client when trading on Liquid
Fixed a bug with inventory skew downsizing both buy and sell orders at the same time in a cycle
Fixed errors when tracking missing orders in web3 wallet class
Fixed a bug that creates orders using all the remaining balance even when below the specified
order_amount
Fixed
_optionals
error when exiting Hummingbot
Fixed unhandled trading pair error when running
create
command in Kraken
Fixed client and Telegram notification when hanging orders are filled
Fixed missing fiat currency pairs in Binance
export const _frontmatter = {"title":"Version 0.29.0"}
